title: Topic 001 Question 923
body: A company has set up a VPC on AWS. The company needs a dedicated connection between the VPC and the company’s on-premises network.
Which action should the company take to meet this requirement?
options: Establish a VPN connection between the VPC and the company’s on-premises network.
Establish an AWS Direct Connect connection between the VPC and the company’s on-premises network.
Attach an internet gateway to the VPUse the AWS public endpoints for connectivity.
Configure Amazon Connect to provide connectivity between the VPC and the company’s on-premises network.
